about_the_game:
As the False Dragon Approaches, Great Calamity Descends.
Those who guard the temple offer blood as sacrifice, while the night watchmen offer themselves.

In early summer, the tranquility of Qining remains unchanged, but your life has undergone a tremendous change. As someone who has lost their role as a night watchman, you embark on a journey of escape and pursuit with your companions.

Roaming through sunsets and seas, traversing between dreams and reality, the bonds of the past and the present intertwine like a red thread, and the obsession entwined with memories and wishes cannot be separated. Solving frequent abnormal cases and seeking your true inner obsession, whether as an anomaly or a human, the only constant is the determination you and he share.

"What is your wish...?"
What is it that you pray for from the divine?





????
"Good."
Why does this person imitate Fang Chenzhi's face? They don't seem like your enemy, but they are not your friend either. A mysterious person who suddenly appears in your life... perhaps they may not even be human.



27
"To maintain order, those who enforce it receive recognition and preferential treatment. This cycle brings stability."
A person holding a supervisory position in the Night Patrol Company, adhering strictly to the principles of order and stability.



Jiang Ying/CV: Mark
"Don't disappear from my sight again..."
A mysterious young man burdened with the secrets of the "Rainbow" organization and the Jiang family. He has sacrificed everything to find the person offered as a sacrifice in Qining for you. At times, he displays a non-human indifference towards emotions. However, he will never suddenly turn his back on you, always keeping his gaze fixed upon you.



Fang Chenzhi/CV: Xiyin
"Trust me, I can handle it."
He was your reliable older neighbor brother from childhood, and he remains reliable even now. Whenever a crisis looms, he always appears in time to protect you from any possible danger. However, it seems he still doesn't understand that you are no longer the little sister who can only be protected by him.



Yan Yang
"No one can insult my friend, except for me."
Warm as sunshine, caring like family. A hidden joker who is on equal footing with Fang Chenzhi. He remains steadfastly by your side, no matter how many challenges you face.




You will experience the latest story endings for the two male leads, making the entire story more complete and the plot more enriched.
New illustrations of mysterious characters.
Approximately 30 new beautiful CGs.
Several animated CGs.
New achievements waiting for you to unlock.

short_description: One year ago, faced with that tremendous calamity, "I" made a decision. Now, one year later, as life remains calm, ripples begin to form. Old acquaintances reunite, new traces emerge. What kind of extraordinary encounters will "I" experience again? New puzzles await their arrival.
